src:
Pink Floyd в студии Abbey Road, 1975
03 Nov 2019, 08:50 by elicaster
Pink Floyd | Abbey Road Studios Print | Jill Furmanovsky PhotoJill Furmanovsky photograph of Pink Floyd in Abbey Road Studios recording Wish You Were Here. Limited edition prints, photos & images for salewww.rockarchive.com
Фотограф Джилл Фурмановски вспоминает: В 1974 году я отправилась фотографировать Pink Floyd во время их тура The Dark Side of the Moon. После гастролей группа отправилась в студию Abbey Road записывать новый альбом под названием Wish You Were Here. Сторм Торгерсон, один из блестящих дизайнеров их пластинок студии Hipgnosis, попросил меня незаметно зайти и сделать несколько фотографий. Должно быть они записывали Welcome to the Machine*, потому что на некоторых снимках изображен Рой Харпер.*Скорей всего, это ошибка и имелось в виду композиция Have a Cigar в которой поёт Рой Харпер.
text:
Pink Floyd at Abbey Road Studios, 1975
03 Nov 2019, 08:50 by elicaster
Pink Floyd | Abbey Road Studios Print | Jill Furmanovsky PhotoJill Furmanovsky photograph of Pink Floyd in Abbey Road Studios recording Wish You Were Here. Limited edition prints, photos & images for salewww.rockarchive.com
Photographer Jill Furmanovsky recalls: In 1974, I went to photograph Pink Floyd during their The Dark Side of the Moon tour. After the tour, the band went to Abbey Road Studios to record a new album called Wish You Were Here. Storm Torgerson, one of the brilliant designers of their Hipgnosis records, asked me to drop by and take some photos. They must have been recording Welcome to the Machine *, because some of the pictures show Roy Harper. * Most likely, this is a mistake and was referring to the song Have a Cigar in which Roy Harper sings.
